title: Final Fantasy
description: The original JRPG, FINAL FANTASY, amazed the world with its rich story and open world. Guide a party of four Warriors of Light through a fantasy world beset with monsters and evil wizards. Engage in tactical turn-based side-view battles and manage the promotion of character classes in a sprawling world!

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: In this classic adventure game, you'll embark on a quest through an open fantasy world to find the Triforce, slay Ganon, and save Princess Zelda. You adventure will be full of dungeons, puzzles, and menacing monsters. You will brandish a variety of weapons like swords, boomerangs, bombs, and arrows. Collect items, find secrets, and save the princess!

title: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: Mario is back in SUPER MARIO BROS. 3! There are new 2D platforming levels and worlds to explore! Jump on monsters, fight mini-bosses, dodge cannonballs, and even avoid ghosts to rescue the King's Wand! Warp through levels and collect special suits that power you up like The Raccoon Suit and The Frog Suit that help you fly and swim through obstacles! SUPER MARIO BROS. 3 is fun to play alone, or to play co-op with a friend!

title: Final Fantasy III
description: FINAL FANTASY III continues the turn-based JRPG tradition of the series, letting you fight through a fantasy world with a party of four heroes! In this game, you can choose different classes for your heroes and summon powerful creatures to aid you in battle like Shiva and Bahamut! Use swords and magic to traverse dungeons, fight monsters, complete quests, and save the world!

title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
description: The sequel to The Legend of Zelda combines side-scrolling 2D platformer action with role-playing game elements. In Zelda II: The Adventure of Link, you'll embark on a fantasy quest to find the Triforce of Courage, awaken Princess Zelda from an evil wizard's spell, and save Hyrule from ruin. As Link, you can learn magic spells and collect items to increase your power. Zelda II features magic that lets you fly, throw fireballs, jump higher, and more.

title: Dragon Quest
description: Dragon Warrior... embark on an epic journey through a fantasy open world to defeat the dark Dragon-lord, save the princess, and bring light back to the kingdom. Solve puzzles, explore lands, use swords and magic to fight monsters like slimes and dragons, and fulfil your destiny in this turn-based single player JRPG! In this role-playing adventure, you are the Dragon Warrior!

title: Dragon Quest III
description: Play one of the most classic and revered turn-based JRPGs of all time... DRAGON QUEST III! Customize a unique hero (male or female) in this fantasy land where you must defeat the Demon Lord Baramos and his legion of monsters! Traverse over 50 caves, dungeons, and towns full of battles and puzzles! Guide a travelling party of three other companions form nine character classes in this epic adventure!

title: Super Mario Bros.
description: Can you save Princess Peach in this classic 2D platformer!? Play as Mario as you quickly run, swim, and jump through levels filled with monsters like koopas and goombas! Use power ups or cooperate with a friend to defeat the Koopa King in the fast-paced adventure that is SUPER MARIO BROS.

title: Final Fantasy II
description: FINAL FANTASY II is the classic turn-based party-based open-world JRPG following FINAL FANTASY. The game features the beautiful tale of four war-orphaned heroes who become embroiled in an epic war. Level up and customize your heroes with specific classes as they battle warriors and monsters with weapons and magic!

title: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!
description: In this single player boxing sports game, play as the underdog Little Mac as he fights through an international roster of boxers from all over the world, including the famous Mike Tyson! Time your punches precisely to win this boss rush of dangerous martial arts fighters in this Nintendo classic!

title: Mega Man
description: MEGA MAN is the robot defender of the human race and he must defeat seven robot masters under the control of the evil Dr. Wily! In this difficult 2D action platformer, fight through labyrinths of robots and collect new blaster weapons from bosses to upgrade your arsenal! Can you save the human race in this platformer classic?

title: Mega Man 2
description: MEGA MAN 2 continues Mega Man's fight against Dr. Wily's eight evil robot masters! Collect new weapons, items, and energy tanks as you jump and fight through levels of evil robots in this difficult, but rewarding, 2D action shooting platformer! You can even use your robot dog to help you!

title: Metroid
description: As Samus Aran, your mission is to stop space pirates from releasing the alien threat of Metroids. To do this, you must navigate the maze-like planet of Zebes! You will shoot aliens, solve navigation puzzles, collect new exciting items and blaster weapons, and experience the classic sci-fi 2D platformer action adventure that is METROID.

title: Castlevania
description: You're in for a long, terrifying night in CASTLEVANIA! As Simon Belmont, fight through a castle of horror monsters like goblins, demons, and wolves to defeat the evil Dracula! This difficult and precise 2D action platformer will have you use many weapons to traverse deeper into the castle labyrinths and face horrors head on! Keep your courage up and your whip ready!

title: Tetris
description: TETRIS is the classic Soviet puzzle game that swept the world. Quickly stack blocks before you get overwhelmed! You must use split-second decision making to make it through all 20 progressively harder levels! It's a perfect low-commitment quick, but rewarding, arcade puzzle game to play!

title: Excitebike
description: In this retro arcade racing game, you will ride your motorcycle through exciting and progressively harder races. You'll face crazy curves and daredevil jumps in this thrilling competitive motorcycling racing game!
